DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine difference way body handle 3 type evacetrapib tablet different particle size . Information side effect also collect . This study consist 3 study period . Participants dose 3 time entire study . Each study period consist inpatient stay 3 day - day dosing ( Day -1 ) , dose day ( Day 1 ) day dose ( Day 2 ) . Then participants asked return clinical research unit ( CRU ) daily outpatient appointment Day 8 . The overall length study 7 week first dose end study . Screening take place within 28 day prior first dose evacetrapib follow-up take place 21 day last dose evacetrapib .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Different Particle Sizes Evacetrapib Healthy Participants
DOC.criteria: Overtly healthy participant nonchild bear potential Have body mass index 18 32 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) Must willing make oneself available whole study willing follow study procedure Have know allergy evacetrapib , compound component related drug , history significant allergic reaction another origin .
